8.movie_plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

82.movie_plot: After his father's death, Gilbert has to care for his mentally disabled brother, Arnie, and his morbidly obese mother, which is suddenly challenged when love walks into his life.

117.movie_plot: A lazy law school grad adopts a kid to impress his girlfriend, but everything doesn't go as planned and he becomes the unlikely foster father.

172.movie_plot: A single mother gives her son a much sought-after doll for his birthday, only to discover that it is possessed by the soul of a serial killer.

225.movie_name: Friday the 13th Part V: A New Beginning (1985)
225.movie_plot: The making of Friday the 13th: A New Beginning (1985) with interviews with the cast and crew.

204.movie_plot: A Los Angeles male escort, who mostly caters to an older female clientèle, is accused of a murder which he did not commit.

49.movie_plot: A gentle man, with scissors for hands, is brought into a new community after living in isolation.

171.movie_plot: A group of scientists band together to save the world from mutated killer tomatoes.

60.movie_plot: After a famous author is rescued from a car crash by a fan of his novels, he comes to realize that the care he is receiving is only the beginning of a nightmare of captivity and abuse.

223.movie_plot: Dream-haunting Freddy Krueger returns once again to prowl the nightmares of Springwood's last surviving teenager, and of a woman whose personal connection to Krueger may mean his doom.

92.movie_plot: A father becomes worried when a local gangster befriends his son in the Bronx in the 1960s.

122.movie_plot: Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in a truck stop populated by vampires, with chaotic results.

28.movie_plot: Ambitious but troubled movie director, Edward D. Wood Jr, tries his best to fulfill his dream, despite his lack of support.

222.movie_name: Nightmare on Elm Street 5: The Dream Child, A (1989)
222.movie_plot: The pregnant Alice finds Freddy Krueger striking through the sleeping mind of her unborn child, hoping to be reborn into the real world.

145.movie_plot: Newlyweds are terrorized by demonic forces after moving into a large house that was the site of a grisly mass murder a year before.

177.movie_plot: A couple who participated in a potent medical experiment gain telekinetic ability and then have a child who is pyrokinetic.

66.movie_plot: When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test as an independent agent with the only athlete who stays with him and his former secretary.

72.movie_plot: On a U.S. nuclear missile sub, a young First Officer stages a mutiny, to prevent his trigger happy Captain from launching his missiles, before confirming his orders to do so.

138.movie_plot: The Buckmans are a midwestern family all dealing with their lives: estranged relatives, raising children, pressures of the job, and learning to be a good parent and spouse.

43.movie_plot: A research chemist comes under personal and professional attack when he decides to appear in a "60 Minutes" expose on Big Tobacco.

78.movie_plot: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

136.movie_plot: Alien brain parasites, entering humans through the mouth, turn their host into a killing zombie. Some teenagers start to fight against them.

221.movie_name: Nightmare on Elm Street 4: The Dream Master, A (1988)

170.movie_name: Some Folks Call It a Sling Blade (1993)
170.movie_plot: Twenty-five years after commiting a double murder, Karl Childers is going to be released from an institution for the criminally insane. A local reporter comes to talk to him, and after some...

110.movie_plot: A young woman is forced to fulfill her destiny of fighting vampires and demons with the help of her friends all the while struggling to live a normal teenage life of heart break and drama.

77.movie_plot: Photographer Robert Kincaid wanders into the life of housewife Francesca Johnson, for four days in the 1960s.

194.movie_name: Old Man and the Sea, The (1958)
194.movie_plot: After living a long and colorful life, Allan Karlsson finds himself stuck in a nursing home. On his 100th birthday, he leaps out a window and begins an unexpected journey.

39.movie_plot: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the mafia life, at the expense of his regular one.

107.movie_plot: When a worldly singer witnesses a mob crime, the police hide her as a nun in a traditional convent where she has trouble fitting in.

69.movie_plot: A basketball player's father must try to convince him to go to a college so he can get a shorter sentence.

147.movie_plot: An American serving in the French Foreign Legion on an archaeological dig at the ancient city of Hamunaptra accidentally awakens a mummy that wreaks havoc on him, and his crew.

213.movie_name: Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers (1988)

162.movie_plot: Two years after the first series of murders, a new psychopath dons the Ghostface costume and a new string of killings begins.

112.movie_plot: An Iowa corn farmer, hearing voices, interprets them as a command to build a baseball diamond in his fields; he does, and the 1919 Chicago White Sox come.

135.movie_plot: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

87.movie_plot: In a remote woodland cabin, a small town doctor discovers Nell - a beautiful young hermit woman with many secrets.

196.movie_plot: A pharmacy-robbing dope fiend and his crew pop pills and evade the law.

1.movie_plot: The victims of an encephalitis epidemic many years ago have been catatonic ever since, but now a new drug offers the prospect of reviving them.

164.movie_plot: One hundred fifty dead, and three hundred fifty missing in the tiny mountain town of Snowfield, Colorado, and that's only the beginning.

210.movie_plot: The almost-human son of "Brundlefly" searches for a cure to his mutated genes while being monitored by a nefarious corporation that wishes to continue his father's experiments.

64.movie_plot: When a girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her daughter.

120.movie_plot: A violent, suspended police detective investigates a brutal murder, in which a manipulative and seductive woman could be involved.

167.movie_plot: A young couple is trapped in a remote town where a dangerous religious cult of children believe everyone over the age of 18 must be killed.

104.movie_plot: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

24.movie_plot: An alien takes the form of a young widow's husband and asks her to drive him from Wisconsin to Arizona. The government tries to stop them.

148.movie_plot: A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a new killer, who targets the girl and her friends by using horror films as part of a deadly game.

131.movie_plot: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.

52.movie_name: Henry: Portrait of a Serial Killer (1990)
52.movie_plot: Henry, a drifter, commits a series of brutal murders, supposedly operating with impunity.

214.movie_name: Halloween 5: The Revenge of Michael Myers (1989)
214.movie_plot: One year after the events of Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers (1988), the Shape returns to Haddonfield once again in an attempt to kill his now-mute niece.

227.movie_plot: A demonic force has chosen Freddy Krueger as its portal to the real world. Can Heather Langenkamp play the part of Nancy one last time and trap the evil trying to enter our world?

98.movie_plot: A laid back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

189.movie_name: How Stella Got Her Groove Back (1998)
189.movie_plot: Stella is a highly successful, forty-something San Francisco stock broker who is persuaded by her colorful New York girlfriend Delilah to take a well deserved, first-class vacation to ...

25.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)
25.movie_plot: After the rebels are overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda. His friends accept shelter from a questionable ally as Darth Vader hunts them in a plan to capture Luke.

156.movie_name: I Still Know What You Did Last Summer (1998)
156.movie_plot: The murderous fisherman with a hook is back to once again stalk the two surviving teens, Julie and Ray, who left him for dead, as well as cause even more murder and mayhem, this time at a posh island resort.

184.movie_plot: On the hottest day of the year on a street in the Bedford-Stuyvesant section of Brooklyn, everyone's hate and bigotry smolders and builds until it explodes into violence.

19.movie_plot: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, Sir William Wallace begins a revolt against King Edward I of England.

93.movie_plot: Gabriel returns to try to destroy the human race he despises so much, with the help of a suicidal teen and the opposition of the angel Danyael.

51.movie_plot: There is panic throughout the nation as the dead suddenly come back to life. The film follows a group of characters who barricade themselves in an old farmhouse in an attempt to remain safe from these bloodthirsty, flesh-eating monsters.

3.movie_plot: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

127.movie_plot: A police detective uncovers a conspiracy behind a case involving a high-school guidance counselor when accusations of rape are made against him by two female students.

95.movie_plot: The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.

21.movie_plot: 200 years after her death, Ellen Ripley is revived as a powerful human/alien hybrid clone who must continue her battle against the aliens. Along with a crew of space pirates, Ripley must also prevent the deadly aliens from reaching Earth.

180.movie_plot: A beautiful but naïve aspiring television personality films a documentary on teenagers with a darker ulterior motive.

134.movie_plot: A glowing green orb - which embodies ultimate evil - terrorizes a young girl with an anthology of bizarre and fantastic stories of dark fantasy, eroticism and horror.

108.movie_plot: The life and career of a legendary comedian, Andy Kaufman.

124.movie_plot: An exceptionally adept Florida lawyer is offered a job to work in New York City for a high-end law firm with a high-end boss - the biggest opportunity of his career to date.

146.movie_plot: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and of the future.

54.movie_plot: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

101.movie_plot: A nerdy florist finds his chance for success and romance with the help of a giant man-eating plant who demands to be fed.

159.movie_plot: A family's home is haunted by a host of ghosts.

32.movie_plot: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.

182.movie_plot: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic ability.

89.movie_plot: A prepubescent chess prodigy refuses to harden himself in order to become a champion like the famous but unlikable Bobby Fischer.

116.movie_plot: A man robs a bank to pay for his lover's operation; it turns into a hostage situation and a media circus.

188.movie_plot: A coach with a checkered past and a local drunk train a small town high school basketball team to become a top contender for the championship.

166.movie_plot: After his happy life spins out of control, a preacher from Texas changes his name, goes to Louisiana and starts preaching on the radio.
